short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive periodic notifications when your posts receive likes on The Bore.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On thebore.com, you can now check "My Likes" in the upper right for your most recent posts, how many likes each has received, and who liked which post.
